T02D2904:263a-1: n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni kro dha r'a dza s'a dha nam /
T02D2904:263a-3: khro bo'i rgyal po phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D2904:263a-4: phyag na rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2904:263a-5: g-yon brkyang gar gyis ri bong 'dzin pa la //
T02D2904:263b-0: legs @263b bzhugs khro rgyal klu dgra de btud nas //
T02D2904:263b-1: de bsnyen cho ga bla ma bzang po las //
T02D2904:263b-2: ji ltar 'ongs pa bdag nyid dran par bri //
T02D2904:263b-3: de la khro bo'i bdag po yang dag par bsnyen
T02D2904:263b-4: par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas tho rangs nyid du
T02D2904:263b-5: gdong bkru ba la sogs pa byas nas bsam gtan
T02D2904:263b-6: gyi sa la me tog gcal du bkram pas dga'
T02D2904:263b-7: bar byas pa'i dbus su stan bde ba la 'dug
T02D2904:263b-8: ste / rang gi snying gar yi ge h'um sngon po bsams la /
T02D2904:263b-9: de'i 'od kyis rjes btsun bla ma dang /
T02D2904:263b-10: sangs rgyas dang rgyal ba'i sras thams cad bskul te /
T02D2904:263b-11: de dag gi mdun du yang dang par mchod pa dang /
T02D2904:263b-12: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2904:263b-13: de'i 'og tu aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzras pa bha ba a'atma ko nya\ham /
T02D2904:263b-14: tshig gi don dang bcas par stong pa nyid du rnam par bsam mo //
T02D2904:263b-15: de nas rang gi snying gar aa las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D2904:263b-16: de'i steng du yi ge h'um mthing ga 'od dang bcas par bsams te /
T02D2904:263b-17: de'i 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus par sbyangs shing /
T02D2904:263b-18: rang gi lhag pa'i skur gyur te /
T02D2904:263b-19: de dag thams cad 'dus nas sa bon gyi yi ge la bzhugs pa dang /
T02D2904:263b-20: rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa 'do zer gyi phreng ba 'khrugs par gyur pa blta ste /
T02D2904:263b-21: de nas yang de las 'od zer 'phros pas sems can ma lus par rab tu drangs te /
T02D2904:263b-22: rdo rje la zhugs pa dang /
T02D2904:263b-23: de nas de yongs su gyur pa las kha dog sngon po cher 'bar ba //
T02D2904:263b-24: rab tu khros shing 'dug pa ste //
T02D2904:263b-25: g-yon brkyang ba yis legs brten pa //
T02D2904:263b-26: bcu drug lo lon lta bu la //
T02D2904:263b-27: rab tu khros pa'i lta stangs can //
T02D2904:263b-28: lto 'phye brgyad kyis rnam brgyad cing //
T02D2904:263b-29: zla ba'i gdan la legs bzhugs pa //
T02D2904:263b-30: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
T02D2904:263b-31: g-yas na rdo rje rtse lnga pa //
T02D2904:263b-32: bsnun pa'i tshul gyis legs bzung zhing //
T02D2904:263b-33: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub 'dzin mdzad pa //
T02D2904:263b-34: smad g-yogs sngon po legs bsnams shing //
T02D2904:263b-35: spyan dmar mche ba rnams gcig pa //
T02D2904:263b-36: nyi ma'i 'od can mgo skyes ni //
T02D2904:263b-37: dmar ser gyen phyogs cod pan can //
T02D2904:263b-38: ha ha 'o dod chen po yis//
T02D2904:263b-39: log 'dren la sogs skrag byed pa //
T02D2904:263b-40: 'jig byed khro bo'i bdag por ni //
T02D2904:263b-41: bdag nyid rnam par bsam par bya //
T02D2904:263b-42: de'i rjes su nyid kyi thugs ka'i h'um las 'od
T02D2904:263b-43: zer 'phros pas ye shes sems dpa'i spyan drangs te
T02D2904:263b-44: / yang dag par mchod la dza: h'um bam ho: zhes pas /
T02D2904:264a-0: de dgug pa dang gzhug pa @264a * //
T02D2904:264a-4: de nas sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir
T02D2904:264a-5: spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang snying ga'i zla ba'i
T02D2904:264a-6: dkyil 'khor rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2904:264a-7: du dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po'i aom
T02D2904:264a-8: a'a: h'um rnams rnam par bsam mo //
T02D2904:264a-9: de'i 'og tu spros pa dang bsdu ba'i rim pas
T02D2904:264a-10: ji srid skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar du bsgom
T02D2904:264a-11: par bya zhing skyo bar gyur na sngags bzlas par
T02D2904:264a-12: bya ste / skyen pa dang bul ba dang shin
T02D2904:264a-13: tu gsal ba dang mi gsal ba yang ma yin
T02D2904:264a-14: pa'i rnam par rtog pa spangs pas so //
T02D2904:264a-16: aom aa k'a ro mu kham zhes bya ba la sogs bas gtor ma nye bar phul te /
T02D2904:264a-17: aom badzra sa tva sa ma ya /
T02D2904:264a-19: badzra sa tva tve no ba ti shtha /
T02D2904:264a-21: su ho shyo me bha ba /
T02D2904:264a-22: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D2904:264a-23: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D2904:264a-24: sarba si ddhi mme pra ya tstsha /
T02D2904:264a-25: sarba ka rma su tsa me rtsi ttam shre ya:
T02D2904:264a-26: ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho: bh ga
T02D2904:264a-27: b'a na / sarba ta th'a ga ta /
T02D2904:264a-28: badzra m'a me munytsa badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa
T02D2904:264a-29: ma ya sa tva h'a: zhes bya bas lhag pa
T02D2904:264a-30: dang ma tshang pa dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o
T02D2904:264a-31: // de'i rjes su ye shes sems dpa'i yang dag par mchod pas /
T02D2904:264a-32: aom kro dha bha ba sarba sa tr'a rtha /
T02D2904:264a-33: si dh'a tantva [?] ya tha mu gatstsha dha /
T02D2904:264a-35: pu nar ga ma n'a ya mu: zhes bya ba 'dis gshegs par bya'o//
T02D2904:264a-36: de la 'dir yang dag par bsnyen pa'i sngags ni /
T02D2904:264a-37: aom n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni h'um phat ces bya'o //
T02D2904:264a-38: de ltar sgrub la mngon brtson skal ldan rnams kyis ni //
T02D2904:264a-39: bsgrims te rang gi bla ma'i man ngag bdud rtsi gang //
T02D2904:264a-40: 'thungs pas lus sogs rab rgyas sngags rtsa skyes pa yis //
T02D2904:264a-41: rtogs pas bstan pa'i las la rab sbyar bde ba ni //
T02D2904:264a-42: de yis gnod pa ma lus bsal bar phod pa ste //
T02D2904:264a-43: gang dag skal ldan sngon gyi skye bar bsnyen byas pa //
T02D2904:264a-44: de dag bla ma bzang pos nyer bstan thob tsam gyis //
T02D2904:264a-45: stong du bsnyen pa ma byas rtog par sbyar bas kyang //
T02D2904:264a-46: dgos pa lus med mi ring nyid kyis 'byung bar 'gyur //
T02D2904:264a-47: de ltar bla mas gang bshad phan byung bdud rtsi yi //
T02D2904:264a-48: thigs pas sdug bsngal zhi byed 'di ni 'dir gtor pas //
T02D2904:264a-49: skye bo rtog pa'i dug ni nad med nyams gyur pa //
T02D2904:264a-50: de rtogs rtog skyes nad dang nyer 'tshe zhi bar shog / bdag gis 'di dang gzhan dag tu//
T02D2904:264b-0: @264b bsod nams gang dang gang byis pa //
T02D2904:264b-1: bsod nams de yis mgon po rnams //
T02D2904:264b-2: rtag tu bdag gis mthong bar shog / khro bo'i
T02D2904:264b-3: rgyal po phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can
T02D2904:264b-4: gyi sgrub thabs // slob dpon su tsandra bha dra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
